      • setupTeam

        Team setupTeam(Team team,
               Cursor statsCursor)
        Fills an individual team with all the data needed to display and sort it for this particular pick type. Is overrided in each subclass.
        Parameters:
        team - The team object to fill with data
        statsCursor - The response from the database with the data to use for the team
        Returns:
        The filled team
